objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Action/Adventure lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about family and relationships using formal register
Students create original action themed content about family and relationships in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using formal register in action context
Character B: Responding in formal register within action theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
